# Backend Development Guidelines

## Documentation
Before working on backend code, review:
- #file:backend/README.md for architecture details
- #file:LOCAL_SETUP.md for setup requirements
- #file:DEPLOYMENT.md for deployment considerations

## Backend Rules
Keep things simple and maintainable

## When to Update Documentation
Update #file:backend/README.md when:
- Adding new API endpoints
- Changing database schema
- Modifying architecture patterns
- Adding new dependencies
